scripts.start: lsof -ti:3000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && next dev
scripts.start:tail: lsof -ti:3000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && next dev 2>&1 | tail -f
scripts.stop: lsof -ti:3000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null && echo 'Dashboard stopped on port 3000' || echo 'No process found on port 3000'
